An Evening of Light and Magic

3
Rohese
Thursday, November 16th, 2017, 11:05:16 AM

When: Sunday 19th November @ 6pm

Where: Sylvanfair Grove, Landing [#8753, go west]

Join House Sylvanfair at twilight for a mystical hour of light and magic. The Grove will be filled with the smoky haze of alchemy, the murmur of spell incantations, and the colorful crackle of fireworks. There will also be a raffle for the chance to learn a special spell preparation.

Don't forget to pick up your collectible charm or game to participate in our year-long reward scheme! See House Sylvanfairâ€™s wiki page for more information.

Friday, November 17th, 2017, 9:45:50 AM

A raffle has been set up in the Sylvanfair Grove (lich #8753, go west).

On the copper raffle cauldron you see a warning sign, a raffle ticket barrel and some raffle tickets.

l ticket The raffle is for "... a special spell prep! Winner needs to be present at the drawing. The choice of spell prep will be in the order of names drawn.". The tickets sell for 10,000 silvers each. The drawing will be in 56 hours and 52 minutes for 3 winners.

Raffle will draw on Sunday 19th November, at 6.30pm, during our Evening of Light and Magic. Expect to spell ups, fireworks, alchemy potions and wands.
